predicate.note: Frames file for 'discolor' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause to have a bad color

example.name: one example should be enough
example.text: In one personal-injury case, a woman claimed she had been injured when she slipped in a pool, but the fall didn't explain why one of her arms was discolored [*-2] [*-5] bluish [*T*-4].
